data.actual_result: The green circle is still there
data.expected_result: The green circle disappears after you leave the voice channel
data.short_description: (Probably desktop app specific) The green circle from another user is still shown even when you leave the voice channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Make someone that can constantly transmit voice join a voice channel (like a user or a music bot) - Join that voice channel and observe the green circle from that other user - Leave that voice channel
